title: React Currency Converter
description: Real‑time currency converter built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS; fetches live exchange rates and is auto‑deployed on Netlify.

title: Weather App
description: Responsive weather dashboard in vanilla JavaScript that shows current conditions via the OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Linear Gradient Generator
description: Interactive tool to craft CSS linear gradients, preview them live, and copy the code with one click.

title: Product Branding Website
description: Fully responsive single‑page shopping site with modern UI interactions, built in pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Password Generator
description: Secure password generator built in React; lets users choose length and character sets and copy results to the clipboard.
